title: Younger guys dig older women
body: Poster art by the ultra-talented Matthew Elliot.
author: Dan

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body: No, you were napping and spooning Polly Perkins! Watch it or Pillow Pants will get you!

comments.author: Ian
comments.body:
Probably masturbating, RJ. Duh.

I like seeing things in the Moxie, of course, but I also enjoy seeing Moxie things outside the Moxie. We're all winners!

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body:
Now, what's the latest on January? I can't wait any longer.

And one last time:

What are you doing in the masturbatorium?!

comments.author: SpringfieldMofo
comments.body: I'm super excited for this double feature, quick question what films will be presented as part two ?

comments.author: dan
comments.body:
Posted By: SpringfieldMofoI'm super excited for this double feature, quick question what films will be presented as part two ?

We keep the films secret until about a month before they show.

comments.author: cynicalheretic
comments.body: Non Factual assertion.  Younger guys dig any piece of tail they can get.

comments.author: erin
comments.body:
caleb and brian.... what night are we going to see these?
ian. you too.

the double feature? yes?! i should hope so.

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body:
Deleted scene from the unmade The Graduate 1997:

"Mrs. Robertson, are you trying to sell me Avon?"

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body: Sweet sweet sweet. I'm stoked. This should be rad. Awesome. Okay, I'm done.

comments.author: dan
comments.body: @RJ: do you just watch films on fast forward so you can say you've "seen" them? I think your confusion about the corvette/hearse, and insistence that you've seen the movie, proves this theory.

comments.body:
That poster is freakin AWESOME.

I can't wait for this.

comments.body:
can i say it?! can i?!!


.....

oh, rj.

comments.author: dan
comments.body: Did you just watch it in the 2 hours it took you to answer my question?

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body: No, but it looks like a Corvette/Hearse hybrid.

comments.author: dan
comments.body: Have you seen HAROLD AND MAUDE, RJ?
